name: Seven (itch) (tttttm, meatbal14)
description:
Seven is a role playing adventure game.  You play as Raymond: the eldest of 7 gnome brothers who live on the island of Gnomeland with Father Gnome.

Today is your 7th birthday, and you are not going to let any of your brothers' antics ruin your Birthday Party.

Notes

- Mouse and keyboard support are limited. Use a controller for best results

- The Windows build has a known rendering issue that gives everything a washed-out blueish color

- This game is by no means complete. We would even go as far as to describe it as broken

Credits & attributions

Dialogic plugin by Emilio Coppola

Mojito by Ron Gelinas Chillout Lounge

Shopping w Paranoid by Paranoid

tttttm: programming, art, level design, initial concept

meatbal14: dialogue, programming
